policy_localized.en: Rate does not include taxes. Subject to availability. *Blackout dates may apply: November 28-30, December 3-10; 26-31, January 29-30, February 14-16, March 5-8; 13-15. Does not apply to existing bookings or group reservations. Hotel Fee of $16.95 plus tax, per night.
